purpose: Verify that the DUT protects itself and external circuitry under short-circuit conditions.
scope: Applies to DUTs with built-in short-circuit or overcurrent protection.
setup: Configure DUT with short-circuit path at output. Use current-limited supply and fast protection monitoring.
procedure:
1. Set current limit to safe maximum.
2. Apply short circuit condition at output.
3. Enable DUT and capture current and voltage during event.
4. Verify proper protection response.
measurement: Measure peak fault current and time to protection action.
acceptancecriteria: Fault current and duration must be within specified limits. DUT must not be damaged.

example_data.description: Short-circuit event showing current and voltage.
